name: Flame Spitting Toddler
desc: This youngster breathes fire every time it opens its mouth.

actions.name: Burning Babble
actions.desc: The toddler opens its mouth to speak and a gout of flames erupts in a 15-ft. cone. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one.
